original_text: And when the men of Israel turned again, the men of Benjamin were amazed: for they saw that evil was come upon them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람은 돌아서는지라 베냐민 사람들이 화가 자기들에게 미친 것을 보고 심히 놀라

sentences.original_text: And when the men of Israel turned again
the men of Benjamin were amazed
for they saw that evil was come upon them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 재앙이 자기들에게 임한 것을 보았기 때문입니다
